intent: Calculate the ratio of customers who pay in EUR to those who pay in CZK

candidates.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE payment_currency = 'EUR')::float / NULLIF(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE payment_currency = 'CZK'), 0) AS ratio FROM customers
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE payment_currency = 'EUR')::float / NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE payment_currency = 'CZK'), 0) AS ratio
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN payment_currency = 'EUR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::float / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN payment_currency = 'CZK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS ratio FROM customers

notes: Assumes 'payment_currency' is a column in the 'customers' table. No other tables are involved in the query.
